summary.title: Grupo Caballero manages Cap Table and Incentive Plans with Sttok

quote.text: 'Sttok has been a key tool for managing our Cap Table and Incentive Plans. It has allowed us to automate manual tasks and save time in generating documents and electronic signatures.'

features.value: Cap Table, Incentive Plans, Document Generation, Automated Signing, etc

sections.title: A bit about Grupo Caballero
texts: Grupo Caballero is a leading beverage company in the Spanish market, with a wide range of products and internationally recognized brands. The company has experienced significant growth since its foundation, excelling in product innovation and quality.

sections.title: Why did they choose us?
texts: 1. For the ease of use of the platform.
2. For the automation of manual tasks.
3. For the management of the Shareholder Register (Cap Table).
4. For document generation and automated signing.
5. For the management of Incentive Plans.
